alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 10:43PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wicomico and Worcester Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1043 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Selbyville to near Berlin to 10 miles southeast of Snow Hill. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocean City, Berlin, Snow Hill, Cape Isle Of Wight, Ocean Pines, Newark, Pittsville, Willards, Bishop, Boxiron, Ocean City Municipality, Bishopville, Public Landing, Ironshire, West Ocean City, Cedartown, Powellville, Mount Wesley, Whaleyville and Showell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
